import React from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const handleSquareClick=colour=>{console.log(`${colour} square clicked!`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",style:styles.container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["style=",{...styles.square,backgroundColor:'red'},"onClick=",()=>handleSquareClick('Red')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["style=",{...styles.square,backgroundColor:'blue'},"onClick=",()=>handleSquareClick('Blue')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["style=",{...styles.square,backgroundColor:'green'},"onClick=",()=>handleSquareClick('Green')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["style=",{...styles.square,backgroundColor:'yellow'},"onClick=",()=>handleSquareClick('Yellow')]})]});}//Inline styles
